resources.string: "This is an android based software application that enables the user to specify the geographical coordinates in form of latitude and longitude, and apply the requested profile for the specific location automatically. The purpose of this system would be capable of taking decision on profile setting to be changed depending on the zone/location in which the mobile would be operating. This application allows user to input locations by typing in the addresses or by selecting location from Google maps as one would do in Google maps (maps.google.com). Along with the locations, the user can specify a relative order among his locations."
